name: Zombie Survivor (Vijay_Vj)
description:
Welcome to Zombie Survivor

This a small game I made where you shoot zombies chasing you. And you need to survive until the last wave.

I was thinking of some improvements. Let me know if you like it and what you think I should add in the game to make it better.

Enjoy!!

Gameplay of my game :

Controls for my game : 

*W A S D  to move

*Left click to shoot the zombies

*Press E to throw the grenade

Download and install instruction :

- Download the .zip file

- Right click it, and unzip the file

 - Double click "Zombie Survivor.exe" to run the game!
